verses.roman:
tomāra anukampā cāhe, bhaje anukṣaṇa
acirāt mile tāṅre tomāra caraṇa

synonyms: tomāra—Your; anukampā—mercy; cāhe—desires; bhaje anukṣaṇa—engages in devotional service twenty-four hours a day; acirāt—very soon; mile—meet; tāṅre—him; tomāra caraṇa—Your lotus feet.
translation: "One who engages in Your devotional service twenty-four hours a day, desiring only Your mercy, will very soon attain shelter at Your lotus feet.
